entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0185.10165] The concept UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease with a value of 0 is reported in the disclosure within the text blocks item us-gaap:UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease, us-gaap:UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease, us-gaap:UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease, us-gaap:IncomeTaxDisclosureTextBlock. The element UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsPeriodIncreaseDecrease should be included in the text block disclosure ScheduleOfUnrecognizedTaxBenefitsRollForwardTableTextBlock instead.
